field.name: article_ids
field.label: SOCIAL2S_ART_IDS
field.query: SELECT id AS value, title AS article_ids FROM #__content

field.name: s2s_stupid_cookie_link
field.label: SOCIAL2S_COOKIE_LINK
field.query: SELECT id AS value, title AS s2s_stupid_cookie_link FROM #__content
